about_the_game:
In Automate It, you enter the fascinating world of industrial automation, where creativity and strategic thinking are key to success. You'll face a series of increasingly complex challenges, designing and managing industrial infrastructures to optimize production.

The game offers a unique puzzle-solving experience, combining elements of strategy, construction, and resource management. With a variety of industrial structures at your disposal, from conveyor belts and production machines to elevators and pipes, you'll have the freedom to create and enhance your own solutions for the challenges ahead.

Players are encouraged to experiment with different strategies and approaches to achieve their goals, fostering creativity and innovation. Produce a variety of resources, including liquids and gases!

Complex Challenges: Face a variety of challenging puzzles that will test your problem-solving skills and strategic thinking.

Satisfying Progression: Experience a sense of achievement as you overcome each challenge and see your creations working seamlessly.

Replay Value: With a wide variety of levels and the ability to play custom and infinite random levels, Automate It offers hours of fun and lasting entertainment.

At the heart of Automate It is the exciting journey of transforming raw materials into finished products, using technology and ingenuity to achieve maximum efficiency. Get ready to dive into a world of industrial engineering and discover the power of automation! So go on and start Automate It!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (Version 1909 or Newer)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 5 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or AMD Radeon RX 560 (or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX or Vulkan Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or AMD Ryzen 7 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1660 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 5700 (or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX or Vulkan Compatible

short_description: Automate It is a factory building game that challenges players to find clever solutions within size, power, and time constraints. Design, build, and share your own puzzles with other players. If you want to build it - choose Automate It.
